metadata.title: CVE-2022-1640 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Sharing in Google Chrome prior to 101.0.4951.64 allowed aremote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UI interactionsto potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
